Key Match Events: Tommy Pham made a catch on a fly ball by Luis Garcia Jr. for an out during the fourth inning
Nasim Nuñez's low throw to first ended Kansas City’s 27-inning scoreless streak in the 10th inning
Miscellaneous Highlights: Kansas City and Detroit are both 83-74 but the Royals own the head-to-head tiebreaker
Both teams are 1 1/2 games up on Minnesota
Hunter Harvey will be shut down for the season due to back issues
James McArthur won't return this season due to right elbow issues
Michael Lorenzen is set to return from the injured list to make Wednesday’s start
